refined_prompts.original_description: Showcasing the product 'Hailuo Fix' in a vibrant and engaging way.
refined_prompts.enhanced_prompt: Create a dynamic product showcase video with a sleek modern aesthetic. Close-up tracking shot of Hailuo Fix product rotating 360 degrees against a gradient background shifting from electric blue to vibrant red. Cinematic lighting with rim highlights emphasizing product contours. Shallow depth of field with subtle lens flares. Camera smoothly orbits product while maintaining sharp focus. Integrate floating 3D text elements that emerge organically from product silhouette. Hyperrealistic product texture with subtle environmental reflections.
alternative_prompts: Minimalist white studio setting with Hailuo Fix floating in zero gravity. Dynamic particle effects emanate from product surface, color-shifting through brand palette. Macro lens captures intricate product details with tilt-shift focus transitions.

Urban environment with Hailuo Fix seamlessly integrated into lifestyle moments. Quick cuts between different use cases, each scene color-graded to emphasize product presence. Handheld camera movement with stabilized tracking.

refined_prompts.original_description: Highlighting the key benefits and uses of Hailuo Fix.
refined_prompts.enhanced_prompt: Split-screen demonstration showing before/after scenarios in synchronized motion. Left panel shows problem situation in desaturated tones, right panel reveals Hailuo Fix solution in vibrant colors. Smooth morphing transitions between use cases. Include dynamic text overlays with 3D depth effect. Camera moves from wide establishing shots to detailed close-ups of product application. Professional lighting emphasizes transformation results.
alternative_prompts: Time-lapse sequence showing multiple Hailuo Fix applications in different scenarios. Quick cuts with match dissolves between scenes. Integrated motion graphics highlight key benefits with animated icons.
POV style demonstration with hands demonstrating product usage. Clean white background with accent lighting. Slow motion details of product effectiveness with dramatic color enhancement.

model_specific_tips: Use high-contrast lighting for better product definition in Hailuo-02
Implement smooth transitions for Runway-gen3 to avoid artifacts
Maintain consistent color grading across model variations

claude_refinement.claude_analysis: The refined prompts emphasize dynamic visual elements while maintaining professional commercial quality. The combination of cinematic techniques with practical demonstration aspects should drive high engagement. Split-testing between different prompt variations recommended for optimal performance.
improvement_suggestions: Added specific camera movement instructions for more dynamic shots
Enhanced color grading parameters for better visual impact
Integrated technical specifications for consistent quality across models
Included alternative approaches for versatility in content generation

message: Claude prompt refinement complete - ready for video generation!
